raw_text:
Z        SALES CONSULTANT         Summary    Highly motivated, competitive, sales consultant seeking opportunity with long-term growth potential through integrity sales success, building relationships and developing the business Performance Skills 
*Account Penetration 
*Adaptability
*Identify and create new business opportunities     
*Brain lab navigation experience 
*Demonstrating Products
*Product Launch 
*Account Relationships
*Confident clinical expertise          Snap Shot      Sales Consultant   City  ,   State    Company Name  /   Jun 2013   to   Current       Cultivate relationships with surgeons while covering procedures with clinical proficiency and business acumen.  Build and implement sales plan, manage and track customer sales activity and prospective customer initiatives.  Team increased territory sales 12.5% to 3.8 million in 2014, 5% to 4 million in 2015 and 10% to in 2016.  Increase physician volume through PCP events, community outreach programs and  marketing strategies.  Serve as a primary resource to key accounts for full line product support and continued service.  Ability to troubleshoot complex issues with highly creative solutions.  Maintain training in sales skills, new technologies, product features, and competitive product portfolios.  Develop relationships with hospital personnel and key account stakeholders to expedite sales.  Demos and lab training to demonstrate products and surgical techniques.                    Office Intern   City  ,   State    Company Name  /   Oct 2012   to   May 2013       Compiled sales data, generated sales reports for territory managers and profiled prospective surgeons.  Organized and distributed marketing information, product portfolio, audits and sales goals projections.  Organized and participated in training labs for potential surgeon customers.          Server / Bartender   City  ,   State    Company Name  /   May 2010   to   May 2013       Worked full-time while completing bachelor's degree and internship.  Amongst top 5 in sales regularly maintaining $90 plus per person guest average.  Exceptional multi-tasking ability proven to effectively and efficiently service large amounts of business.          Education      B.B.A  :   Business Management Management Information Systems, Business Intelligence    Florida Atlantic University     May 2014       City  ,   State      Business Management Management Information Systems, Business Intelligence        Skills    competitive, features, marketing strategies, marketing, multi-tasking, personnel, sales skills, sales, sales plan, sales reports, surgeon, troubleshoot
story:
Let me transform this resume into a narrative story:

Meet Z, a driven sales consultant whose career journey reflects a perfect blend of determination and relationship-building prowess. Their story begins during their college years at Florida Atlantic University, where they demonstrated exceptional work ethic by maintaining a full-time position as a server and bartender while pursuing their B.B.A in Business Management. As one of the top 5 servers, they consistently maintained an impressive $90+ per person average, foreshadowing their future success in sales.

In late 2012, while still completing their degree, Z took their first step into the medical sales industry as an Office Intern. During this time, they gained valuable experience behind the scenes, managing sales data, organizing marketing materials, and getting their first taste of surgeon training labs.

The real turning point came in June 2013 when Z stepped into their current role as a Sales Consultant. Here, they've truly found their calling, becoming an integral link between cutting-edge medical technology and the surgeons who use it. Their ability to navigate brain labs and demonstrate products with clinical expertise has made them a trusted resource for physicians.

Z's impact on the business has been remarkable. Together with their team, they've driven consistent growth year over year - achieving a 12.5% increase to $3.8 million in 2014, followed by a 5% bump to $4 million in 2015, and an impressive 10% growth in 2016. They've accomplished this through creative marketing strategies, community outreach programs, and by building strong relationships with healthcare professionals at all levels.

What makes Z stand out is their ability to troubleshoot complex issues with innovative solutions, while maintaining deep product knowledge and staying current with new technologies. Their story is one of continuous growth, adaptability, and unwavering commitment to both technical excellence and relationship building in the medical sales field.

This narrative showcases someone who started from a customer service background and evolved into a sophisticated medical sales professional, consistently delivering results while maintaining the highest standards of integrity in their approach to sales.
